data.title: FINAL FANTASY OST
data.meta_description: 「FINAL FANTASY」シリーズ関連のオリジナル・サウンドトラックです。
data.text:
FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Introducing the original soundtrack for FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH!

The album contains 7 CDs of sprawling selection of tracks, including the theme song "No Promises to Keep LOVELESS Ver." composed by Nobuo Uematsu.

*The song is a different version from "No ...

GROWING LIGHT: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

New melodies set the stage for our heroes as they embark on their next adventure…

Experience the adventures once more in this Blu-ray Music Disc album that collects 93 songs from Patch 6.1 through 6.5.

FINAL FANTASY XI Gifts from Vana’diel: Prime Memories Soundtrack

Original Soundtrack

20th Vana'versary Main Theme and The Voracious Resurgence music now available for download!

FINAL FANTASY XI is a critically acclaimed MMORPG that officially commenced service in 2002.

This new soundtrack contains a variety of songs, including the 20th Vana'versary main theme "We Are Va...

FINAL FANTASY GRANDMASTERS Original Soundtrack

Original Soundtrack

Music depicting another side of Vana'diel has returned!

FINAL FANTASY GRANDMASTERS explores a different side of Vana'diel, the world of FINAL FANTASY XI. Familiar songs from the nostalgia-inducing smartphone online RPG are now available for download and vi...

ENDWALKER: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Endwalker brings the tale of Hydaelyn and Zodiark to a conclusion eons in the making.

Warrior of Light – Bear forth our hope, that these days not be the last!

The soundtrack features 62 songs from the expansion, including the “Endwalker” theme song.

Death Unto Dawn: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

The soundtrack for FFXIV patch 5.x seires!

New melodies set the stage for our heroes as they embark on their next adventure…

Experience the adventures once more in this Blu-ray Music Disc album that collects 84 songs from Patch 5.1 throug...

FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper Original Soundtrack Vol.4

Original Soundtrack

Indulge in the variety of melodies our fourth soundtrack has to offer!

Two years have passed since our last edition, Vol. 3, was released. This new addition will contain the numerous songs added between the years 2018 to 2020, and listeners can enjoy a wide selection of ...

FINAL FANTASY VIII ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK REVIVAL DISC

Blu-ray Disc Music

The sights and sounds of this enduring fan favorite are back and better than ever! Enjoy tracks such as "Liberi Fatali," "Force Your Way," and "Eyes On Me" alongside visuals from the 1999 classic.

SHADOWBRINGERS: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Tunes that accompanied the donning of the mantle of darkness

This album contains music from the hit FINAL FANTASY XIV expansion: SHADOWBRINGERS!

Also included are tracks from Patch 4.4 onward that did not make it into the previous ""STORMBLOOD: FINAL...

FINAL FANTASY VII ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK REVIVAL DISC

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Relive your memories of Cloud, Aerith, and Sephiroth with this remastered collection!

Relive the sights and sounds of the expansive and emotional 1997 adventure that has captivated over 11 million players worldwide! This Blu-ray Disc contains all 85 tracks written by the father of the ...

DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Original Soundtrack Vol.2

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The second collection of music from the hit fighting game is here!

This two-disc collection contains all 34 tracks added to the game post-release. Takeharu Ishimoto (The World Ends with You, KINGDOM HEARTS III) returns to the DISSIDIA series to bring you brand-new ar...

FINAL FANTASY VI ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK REVIVAL DISC

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Get reacquainted with some old friends

Music from the legendary title, first released in 1994, that has sold over 4.3 million physical and digital copies (as of September 2018).

Contains all 61 tracks written by famed composer N...

FINAL FANTASY V ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK REVIVAL DISC

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Relive the chance encounters of the Warriors of Light and the music that scored their journey

The third installment in this revival series features the complete soundtrack to the 1992 Super Nintendo classic—with all 67 tracks contained here on a single Blu-ray Disc! Includes memorable music fr...

FINAL FANTASY IV Original Soundtrack Revival Disc

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Enjoy the sights and sounds of this timeless classic

The second installment in this revival series features the full soundtrack to the 1991 Super Nintendo classic—all contained here on a single Blu-ray Disc!

FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper Original Soundtrack Vol. 3

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Memories of journeys past come to life in this musical collection

The third soundtrack to the hit mobile game features arrangements of your favorite FINAL FANTASY music as well as a slew of all-new tunes!

FINAL FANTASY I/II/III Original Soundtrack Revival Disc

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Go back to where it all began!

This compilation features a total of 90 tracks from the first three games in the series: FINAL FANTASY (1987), FINAL FANTASY II (1988), and FINAL FANTASY III (1990). Includes in-game video footage fro...

STORMBLOOD: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Join the fight for freedom and listen to the sounds of a new adventure!

Relive the rebellions in Ala Mhigo and Doma with the soundtrack to their fight for freedom! This Blu-ray disc includes nearly 100 tracks from Patches 4.0 to 4.3, featuring a collection of iconic overw...

MOBIUS FINAL FANTASY Original Soundtrack 2

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The music from Chapters 4 through 8!

MOBIUS FINAL FANTASY was created by Yoshinori Kitase (FFVII, FFXIII) and some of the finest in-house staff to work on numbered FINAL FANTASY titles. The end product: one of the best RPGs available on ...

FINAL FANTASY XII THE ZODIAC AGE Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

The tale of Ivalice as told through music

One of the most beloved entries in the hit RPG series has been remastered in gorgeous HD. This audio-visual soundtrack includes new music written by composer Hitoshi Sakimoto exclusively for THE ZODIA...

THE FAR EDGE OF FATE: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Collection of music from the FFXIV 3.X series!

This soundtrack to FINAL FANTASY XIV: HEAVENSWARD contains all the music released between Patch 3.2 and Patch 3.5. Nidhogg is slain and the Dragonsong War ended, but what awaits the Warrior of Light a...

WORLD OF FINAL FANTASY Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Enjoy the music of a new type of FINAL FANTASY

WORLD OF FINAL FANTASY is the first game in the series that allows you to turn foes into friends as you recruit and raise a party of monsters. This soundtrack contains Masashi Hamauzu's complete score...

DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY -Arcade- Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The soundtrack to the hit arcade game is here!

The soundtrack to the hit arcade game is here! In addition to arrangements of your favorite FINAL FANTASY tunes—including recently released tracks from FINAL FANTASY TACTICS—this two-disc collection a...

FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

A new crystal epic given life by Noriyasu Agematsu of Elements Garden

Includes music from the smartphone game FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS. This title had Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden), known for his work on games and anime, as its sound producer. The grand, fantast...

Heavensward: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

The rich and resonant sounds of Heavensward (Patch 3.0-3.1) are here!

This soundtrack features Nobuo Uematsu's "Dragonsong," as well as a slew of pieces from FINAL FANTASY XIV composer and sound director Masayoshi Soken like "Heavensward," "Heroes," "Unbending Steel," a...

FINAL FANTASY EXPLORERS Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

A brand-new FF sound for adventurers of all ages!

Tsuyoshi Sekito has written a score that befits the grandeur of FINAL FANTASY, and it's all here on one disc! In addition to the 33 brand-new tracks written for the game, this album also contains 9 po...

LIGHTNING RETURNS: FINAL FANTASY XIII Original Soundtrack PLUS

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Contains new arrangements and previously unreleased tracks

The trio that brought you FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 (Masashi Hamauzu, Naoshi Mizuta, Mitsuto Suzuki) are back with even more music! This album contains a number of previously unreleased tracks from the fin...

A REALM REBORN: FINAL FANTASY XIV Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Contains all 119 tracks played in-game before Patch 2.1

Masayoshi Soken leads a team of composers including Nobuo Uematsu, Tsuyoshi Sekito, and Naoshi Mizuta in this colossal soundtrack containing over 400 minutes of music! Brought to you in incredible Blu...

FINAL FANTASY X HD Remaster Original Soundtrack

Blu-ray Disc MusicOriginal Soundtrack

Enjoy the beloved sounds of FFX in these all-new arrangements

The beloved sounds of FINAL FANTASY X are back in the unbelievably high quality (96khz/24bit) of Blu-ray Disc Music. Pieces from the original soundtrack are joined by 60 new arrangements from Masashi ...

LIGHTNING RETURNS: FINAL FANTASY XIII Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

God's myth may come to an end, but the music will live on forever

The trio of composers that brought you FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 is back to score the climactic conclusion to Lightning's saga. Masashi Hamauzu (FINAL FANTASY XIII series) is joined by Naoshi Mizuta (FINAL...

FINAL FANTASY V ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK REMASTER VERSION

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Complete collection of the sounds of the Super Nintendo classic

This remastered collection contains some of the series' most beloved music, including "Battle at the Big Bridge," "Four Hearts," "My Home Sweet Home," and the game's iconic "Main Theme."

FINAL FANTASY IV ORIGINAL SOUND TRACK REMASTER VERSION

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Complete collection of the sounds of the Super Nintendo classic

This remastered collection includes extended editions of fan-favorite tunes from the Super Nintendo classic, including "Theme of Love," "The Red Wings," "Battle with the Four Fiends," and the game's i...

FINAL FANTASY XI Seekers of Adoulin Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Contains music from the fifth FFXI expansion pack, Seekers of Adoulin

This soundtrack includes all 12 tracks composed by Naoshi Mizuta for the fifth expansion, as well as an exclusive bonus version of the Voidwatch music. Return to the wilds of Ubulka with this exciting...

FINAL FANTASY XI Original Soundtrack -PLUS-

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Unreleased tracks and PlayOnline music

Contains unreleased tracks from the Wings of the Goddess expansion, as well as music from new scenarios including A Crystalline Prophecy, A Moogle Kupo d'Etat, and A Shantotto Ascension, along with th...

FINAL FANTASY XIII Original Soundtrack PLUS

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Even more musical goodness from FINAL FANTASY XIII

Includes tracks from the overseas version of FINAL FANTASY XIII that were not included in the previous original soundtrack, as well as some protoype pieces composed by Masashi Hamauzu. The album bookl...

FINAL FANTASY CRYSTAL CHRONICLES: ECHOES OF TIME Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Heart-warming melodies from the mind of Kumi Tanioka

Contains all the music from the game in addition to two pieces arranged specially for this album: "Adult Ceremony Remix" and "Play riddles ~Ruins Remix~." You won't want to let this invitation to imme...

DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Let the fight rage on

Contains some of the most popular pieces from FF history!

And that's not all: a star-studded cast of composers including Takeharu Ishimoto, Tsuyoshi Sekito, Mitsuto Suzuki, and Minoru Tsuchihashi...

FINAL FANTASY XI Wings of the Goddess Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Another musical chapter in FINAL FANTASY XI history

Includes both the new field music written for this expansion as well as music from the third expansion, Treasures of Aht Urhgan, that wasn't included in the previous soundtrack.

FINAL FANTASY IV Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Celebrating 16 years with this masterpiece

The legend is reborn on Nintendo DS, 16 years after its original release. This CD even contains some extended versions of tracks that were not included in previous releases. Emi Ida's vocal track "Tsu...

BEFORE CRISIS -FINAL FANTASY VII- & LAST ORDER -FINAL FANTASY VII- ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The music from the hit mobile title and the stunning OVA together at last

Contains tracks from the BEFORE CRISIS -FINAL FANTASY VII- cellphone game previously available on iMode, ezweb, and Yahoo!, in addition to music from LAST ORDER -FINAL FANTASY VII-, an OVA included in...

FINAL FANTASY CRYSTAL CHRONICLES: RING OF FATES Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Magical music that enhances the world of FFCC

A collection of melodic classical pieces, reminiscent of RPGs of old, from the mind of Kumi Tanioka. The cover art for this album was done by Toshiyuki Itahana, who also handled the main character des...

Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: My Life as a King & My Life as a Darklord

Original Soundtrack

Includes the main themes from both titles in addition to a battle track medley supervised by series composer Kumi Tanioka.

FINAL FANTASY III Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The return of a classic

The revival of a historic title from the previous century!

This album includes all the music from the Nintendo DS remake of FINAL FANTASY III, including entirely new tracks composed just for the ...

DIRGE of CERBERUS -FINAL FANTASY VII- MULTIPLAYER MODE Original Sound Collection

Contains music exclusive to the North American version of the game, the title's mutliplayer mode, and other pieces that were not on the original soundtrack.

FINAL FANTASY XI - Treasures of Aht Urhgan Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The sounds of the third FINAL FANTASY XI expansion!

More musical treasures from the masterful Naoshi Mizuta that will accompany you on yet another adventure in Vana'diel!

FINAL FANTASY TACTICS Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Music from the popular SRPG!

This two-disc soundtrack for the 1997 classic contains a treasure trove of tracks composed by Hitoshi Sakamoto and Masaharu Iwata, known for their previous work together on Tactics Ogre.

FINAL FANTASY XI - Chains of Promathia Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The music behind FINAL FANTASY XI's second expansion!

When FINAL FANTASY XI takes center stage, so does Naoshi Mizuta! This album contains 23 new tracks penned by the famed composer and a bonus track featuring a live performance by his band The Star Onio...

FINAL FANTASY IX Original Soundtrack PLUS

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The second FINAL FANTASY IX soundtrack!

More music from the mind of Nobuo Uematsu. This CD includes both tracks from the game and others than ultimately were not used for the title. Be sure not to skip the bonus track: a remix of "Melodies ...

FINAL FANTASY XI - Rise of the Zilart Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Tracks from the hit FINAL FANTASY XI expansion!

A selection of some of the standout tracks from the Rise of the Zilart expansion. Naoshi Mizuta returns to handle composition duties, helping give life to the ever-evolving world of Vana'diel.

FINAL FANTASY VII Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Still going strong more than 20 years on

Includes all the music Nobuo Uematsu composed for the classic game released in 1997. Especially noteworthy tracks include "Those Who Fight" and "One-Winged Angel."

FINAL FANTASY VIII Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Wield the gunblade once more!

Includes all 74 tracks that made up the FINAL FANTASY VIII soundtrack on four discs! Relive your memories of the title that profoundly impacted the game industry as you listen to hits such as "Liberi ...

FINAL FANTASY IX Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

Countless tracks from the mind of Nobuo Uematsu!

Includes all 110 pieces of music composed by Nobuo Uematsu for FFIX on four CDs. This collection of some of the best game music in history, including "A Place To Call Home" and "Melodies of Life" (sun...

FINAL FANTASY X Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

The music behind the ever-popular FFX!

Includes all the tracks from the PS2's must-have RPG!

This album represents the best way to listen to timeless classics such as "To Zanarkand" and the emotional "Suteki da ne" (sung by RIKKI).

FINAL FANTASY XI Original Soundtrack

CDOriginal Soundtrack

FINAL FANTASY XI's melodic beginnings

This CD represents the beginning of FINAL FANTASY XI's musical history. It is the first original soundtrack released for the epic, ever-growing MMORPG. Composition duties were handled by series mainst...

FINAL FANTASY V Original Soundtrack

Original Soundtrack

Features a greater variety of genres and more tracks inspired by ethnic music, such as ""My Home Sweet Home.""

Also includes fan favorite ""Battle on the Big Bridge""!

FINAL FANTASY IV Original Soundtrack

Original Soundtrack

The soundtrack from the first entry in the FINAL FANTASY series on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

Includes the original audio tracks from the SNES release, which enjoy a newfound richne...
